meanings.def: if a person or thing impresses you, you admire them or it
examples: impress (somebody) We interviewed a number of candidates but none of them impressed us.
The Grand Canyon never fails to impress people.
The Grand Canyon never fails to impress.
impress somebody with something He impressed her with his sincerity.
it impresses somebody that… It impressed me that she remembered my name.
I was young and easily impressed.
This game is his big chance to impress.
She impressed us with both the depth and range of her knowledge.

meanings.def: to make somebody understand how important, serious, etc. something is by emphasizing it
examples: He impressed on us the need for immediate action.
Their responsibilities are impressed on them during training.

meanings.def: to have a great effect on something, especially somebody’s mind, imagination, etc.
examples: Her words impressed themselves on my memory.
